00020 STDMETHODIMP ThermalGrabber::SampleCB(double SampleTime, IMediaSample *pSample) {
00021         m_frameNumber = ceil(m_frameRate*SampleTime-TIME_EPSILON);
00022         //echo(String::Format("T frame = {0}", m_frameNumber));
00023         // wait for the color image to be ready
00024         int SYNC_SLEEP_TIME = 1;
00025         while (colorGrabber->m_frameNumber < m_frameNumber)
00026                 ::Sleep( SYNC_SLEEP_TIME );
00027         CAutoLock thermalLock( &m_thermalCriticalSection); 
00028         BYTE*    pData;
00029         pSample->GetPointer(&pData);
00030         VIDEOINFOHEADER *pvi = (VIDEOINFOHEADER *) m_mediaType.pbFormat;
00031         int cxImage    = pvi->bmiHeader.biWidth;
00032     int cyImage    = abs(pvi->bmiHeader.biHeight);
00033     int stride     = (cxImage * sizeof( RGBTRIPLE ) + 3) & -4;
00034         // Copy the data
00035         cvSetImageData( imgVideo, pData, stride );
00036         cvCvtColor(imgVideo, imgThermal, CV_RGB2GRAY);
00037         if (pvi->bmiHeader.biHeight > 0)
00038                 cvFlip(imgThermal);
00039         return S_OK;    
00040 
00041 }       
00042 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 HRESULT SequenceProcessor::SampleCB(double SampleTime, IMediaSample *pSample) {
00044         // compute current frame number
00045         ASSERT(!(pSample->IsPreroll() == S_OK));
00046         REFERENCE_TIME frameOld = m_frameNumber;
00047         m_frameNumber = ceil(m_frameRate*SampleTime-TIME_EPSILON);
00048         //echo(String::Format("frame = {0}", m_frameNumber));
00049     BYTE*    pData;
00050         pSample->GetPointer(&pData);
00051         VIDEOINFOHEADER *pvi = (VIDEOINFOHEADER *) m_mediaType.pbFormat;
00052         int cxImage    = pvi->bmiHeader.biWidth;
00053     int cyImage    = abs(pvi->bmiHeader.biHeight);
00054     int stride     = (cxImage * sizeof( RGBTRIPLE ) + 3) & -4;
00055         // Copy the data
00056         cvSetImageData( imgVideo, pData, stride );
00057         if (m_mode == PGRFILE)
00058                 cvMirror(imgVideo, NULL, 1);
00059         cvCopy(imgVideo, imgFrame);
00060 
00061         if (pvi->bmiHeader.biHeight > 0)
00062                 cvFlip(imgFrame);
00063         return S_OK;    
00064 }

00083 void SequenceProcessor::DeInitialize() {
00084         m_sourcename = ""; 
00085         m_screenname = NULL;
00086         m_frameStart = 0;
00087         m_frameStop = 0;
00088         //ISampleGrabber *pGrabber;

00092         m_compatibleDCfloor.Detach();
00093         if (bmi)
00094                 delete[] bmi;
00095         Clear();

00097         SafeRelease(pMS);
00098         SafeRelease(pWC);
00099         SafeRelease(pME);
00100         SafeRelease(pMixerImage);

00103         if (m_mode == TRGBFILE) {
00104                 SafeRelease(pMSthermal);
00105                 SafeRelease(pGrabberF);
00106                 delete thermalGrabber;
00107         }
00108         SafeRelease(pConfig);
00109         SafeRelease(pGraph);
00110         }

00112 bool SequenceProcessor::Initialize() {
00113         CNewVisionView *activeView = ((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetActivePane();
00114         m_screenname = activeView->m_hWnd;
00115 
00116         if (FAILED(CoCreateInstance(CLSID_FilterGraph, NULL, CLSCTX_INPROC, IID_IGraphBuilder, (void **)&pGraph))) {
00117         ::MessageBox( NULL, "Failed to create DirectX filter graph", "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION );             
00118                   return false;
00119         }
00120 
00121         // create the VMR9 filter
00122         CoCreateInstance(CLSID_VideoMixingRenderer9, NULL, CLSCTX_INPROC,
00123         IID_IBaseFilter, (void**)&pVmr);
00124 
00125         // add the VMR9 filter to the Graph Manager
00126         pGraph->AddFilter(pVmr, L"Video");
00127 
00128         // get a pointer to the IVMRFilterConfig9 interface 
00129         pVmr->QueryInterface(IID_IVMRFilterConfig9, (void**)&pConfig);
00130 
00131         // make sure VMR9 is in windowless mode
00132         pConfig->SetRenderingMode(VMR9Mode_Windowless);
00133 
00134         // get a pointer to the IVMRWindowlessControl9 interface 
00135         pVmr->QueryInterface(IID_IVMRWindowlessControl9, (void**)&pWC);
00136 
00137         // IMediaEventEx tells that an event has occurred (e.g. stopped paused)
00138         pGraph->QueryInterface(IID_IMediaEventEx, (void **)&pME);
00139 
00140         // Set video drawing and notification window
00141         SetVideoWindow(m_screenname);
00142 
00143         // Run source specific initialization
00144         switch(m_mode)
00145         {
00146                 case PGRFILE: { 
00147                         if (!InitPGR()) return false; break; 
00148                 }
00149                 case TRGBFILE: { 
00150                         if (!InitThermal()) return false;
00151                         if (!InitColor()) return false; break; 
00152                 }
00153                 case RGBFILE: { 
00154                         if (!InitColor()) return false; break; 
00155                 }
00156                 case CAMERA: {}
00157         }
00158 
00159         // Turn off DirectShow clock
00160         pGraph->QueryInterface(IID_IMediaFilter, (void**)&pMediaFilter);
00161         pMediaFilter->SetSyncSource(NULL);
00162 
00163         // Set destination rectangle for the video
00164     pWC->GetNativeVideoSize(&cx, &cy, NULL, NULL);
00165         SetVideoPosition(new CRect(0,0,cx,cy), true);
00166         // Get a pointer to the IVMRMixerControl9 interface 
00167         pVmr->QueryInterface(IID_IVMRMixerControl9, (void**)&pMix);
00168         
00169         // Set alpha levels
00170         //      pMix->SetAlpha(0, 0.5); pMix->SetAlpha(1, 1);
00171 
00172         // Create a bitmap to display overlay information
00173         m_compatibleDCvideo.CreateCompatibleDC(activeView->GetDC());
00174 //      BYTE        tmp[sizeof(BITMAPINFO)+255*4];
00175         bmi = (BITMAPINFO*)(new char[sizeof(BITMAPINFO)+255*4]);
00176         memset(bmi,0,sizeof(BITMAPINFO));
00177         bmi->bmiHeader.biSize     = sizeof(BITMAPINFOHEADER);
00178         bmi->bmiHeader.biWidth    = cx;
00179         bmi->bmiHeader.biHeight   = -cy;
00180         bmi->bmiHeader.biPlanes   = 1;
00181         bmi->bmiHeader.biBitCount = 24;
00182         bmi->bmiHeader.biCompression = BI_RGB;
00183         bmi->bmiHeader.biSizeImage  = cx*cy*1;
00184         bmi->bmiHeader.biClrImportant  = 0;
00185         ((DWORD*) bmi->bmiColors)[0] = 0x00FF0000; /* red mask  */
00186         ((DWORD*) bmi->bmiColors)[1] = 0x0000FF00; /* green mask */
00187         ((DWORD*) bmi->bmiColors)[2] = 0x000000FF; /* blue mask  */
00188         m_bitmap = ::CreateDIBSection(m_compatibleDCvideo.m_hDC, bmi, DIB_RGB_COLORS,NULL,0,0);
00189         //m_bitmap = ::CreateDIBitmap(m_compatibleDCvideo.m_hDC, &bmi->bmiHeader, CBM_INIT, NULL, bmi, DIB_RGB_COLORS);
00190 
00191         // Create a bitmap to display floor information
00192         CNewVisionView *floorView = ((CMainFrame*)(theApp.m_pMainWnd))->GetPane(FLOOR_VIEW);
00193         m_compatibleDCfloor.CreateCompatibleDC(floorView->GetDC());
00194         BYTE        tmpF[sizeof(BITMAPINFO)+255*4];
00195         BITMAPINFO *bmiF = (BITMAPINFO*)tmpF;
00196         memset(bmiF,0,sizeof(BITMAPINFO));
00197 
00198         // TEMP: use w,h from FloorModel instead
00199         fcx = 1068, fcy = 866;
00200         //fcx = 1024, fcy = 1024;
00201         bmiF->bmiHeader.biSize     = sizeof(BITMAPINFOHEADER);
00202         bmiF->bmiHeader.biWidth    = fcx;
00203         bmiF->bmiHeader.biHeight   = fcy;
00204         bmiF->bmiHeader.biPlanes   = 1;
00205         bmiF->bmiHeader.biBitCount = 24;
00206         bmiF->bmiHeader.biCompression = BI_RGB;
00207         bmiF->bmiHeader.biSizeImage  = fcx*fcy*1;
00208         bmiF->bmiHeader.biClrImportant  = 0;
00209         ((DWORD*) bmiF->bmiColors)[0] = 0x00FF0000; /* red mask  */
00210         ((DWORD*) bmiF->bmiColors)[1] = 0x0000FF00; /* green mask */
00211         ((DWORD*) bmiF->bmiColors)[2] = 0x000000FF; /* blue mask  */
00212         m_floorBitmap = ::CreateDIBSection(m_compatibleDCfloor.m_hDC, bmiF, DIB_RGB_COLORS, NULL,0,0);
00213 
00214         // Initialize a bitmap to display overlay information
00215         pWC->QueryInterface(IID_IVMRMixerBitmap9, (LPVOID *)&pMixerImage);
00216         this->SetBitmapImage(m_bitmap, cx, cy);
00217 
00218 
00219         // Initialize stream seeking information
00220         IPin *pin2 = GetPin(pGrabberF, PINDIR_OUTPUT, 1);
00221         pin2->QueryInterface(IID_IMediaSeeking, (void **)&pMS);
00222         pMS->SetTimeFormat(&TIME_FORMAT_FRAME);
00223         pMS->GetStopPosition(&m_frameTotal); 
00224         pGrabber->GetConnectedMediaType( &m_mediaType );
00225         VIDEOINFOHEADER *pvi = (VIDEOINFOHEADER *) m_mediaType.pbFormat;
00226         m_frameRate = UNITS/(double)pvi->AvgTimePerFrame;
00227 
00228         // IMediaControl controls flow of data through the graph
00229         pGraph->QueryInterface(IID_IMediaControl, (void **)&pMC);
00230         return true;
00231 }

00233 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 bool SequenceProcessor::InitPGR() {
00235         USES_CONVERSION;
00236         // Create ISampleGrabber to grab frames
00237         if (FAILED(CoCreateInstance(CLSID_SampleGrabber, NULL, CLSCTX_INPROC_SERVER, IID_IBaseFilter, (void**)&pGrabberF))) {
00238                 ::MessageBox( NULL, "Failed to create SampleGrabber filter!", "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION );            
00239                 return false;
00240         }
00241 
00242         pGrabberF->QueryInterface(IID_ISampleGrabber, (void**)&pGrabber);
00243         ZeroMemory(&m_mediaType, sizeof(AM_MEDIA_TYPE));
00244         m_mediaType.majortype = MEDIATYPE_Video;
00245         m_mediaType.subtype = MEDIASUBTYPE_RGB24;
00246         if (FAILED(pGrabber->SetMediaType(&m_mediaType))) {
00247                 ::MessageBox( NULL, "Media type is not True Color RGB!", "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION );         
00248                 return false;
00249         }
00250         pGrabber->SetBufferSamples( FALSE );
00251         pGrabber->SetOneShot( FALSE );
00252         pGrabber->SetCallback( this, 0 );
00253 
00254         if (FAILED(pGraph->AddFilter(pGrabberF, L"Sample Grabber"))) {
00255                 ::MessageBox( NULL, "Failed to add SampleGrabber filter to the graph!", "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION );          
00256                 return false;
00257         }
00258         while (!File::Exists(gcnew String(m_sourcename)) || FAILED(pGraph->RenderFile(A2W(m_sourcename), NULL))) {
00259                 AfxMessageBox("Video file: \""+m_sourcename+"\" appears corrupt or absent!\n Please select another file.", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00260                 char szFilters[] = "AVI Files (*.avi)|*.avi|MPEG Files (*.mpg)|*.mpg|All Files (*.*)|*.*||";
00261                 CFileDialog fileDlg (TRUE, "avi", "*.avi", OFN_FILEMUSTEXIST | OFN_HIDEREADONLY, szFilters, NULL);
00262                 if ( fileDlg.DoModal () == IDOK )
00263                 {
00264                         m_sourcename = fileDlg.GetPathName();
00265                 }
00266                 else {
00267                         return false;
00268                 }
00269 
00270         }
00271         return true;
00272 }

00274 bool SequenceProcessor::InitColor() {
00275         USES_CONVERSION;
00276         // Create ISampleGrabber to grab frames
00277         if (FAILED(CoCreateInstance(CLSID_SampleGrabber, NULL, CLSCTX_INPROC_SERVER, IID_IBaseFilter, (void**)&pGrabberF))) {
00278                 ::MessageBox( NULL, "Failed to create SampleGrabber filter!", "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION );            
00279                 return false;
00280         }
00281         
00282         pGrabberF->QueryInterface(IID_ISampleGrabber, (void**)&pGrabber);
00283         ZeroMemory(&m_mediaType, sizeof(AM_MEDIA_TYPE));
00284         m_mediaType.majortype = MEDIATYPE_Video;
00285         m_mediaType.subtype = MEDIASUBTYPE_RGB24;
00286         if (FAILED(pGrabber->SetMediaType(&m_mediaType))) {
00287                 ::MessageBox( NULL, "Media type is not True Color RGB!", "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION );         
00288                 return false;
00289         }
00290         pGrabber->SetBufferSamples( FALSE );
00291         pGrabber->SetOneShot( FALSE );
00292         pGrabber->SetCallback( this, 0 );
00293 
00294         if (FAILED(pGraph->AddFilter(pGrabberF, L"Sample Grabber"))) {
00295                 ::MessageBox( NULL, "Failed to add SampleGrabber filter to the graph!", "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION );          
00296                 return false;
00297         }
00298 
00299         // Render source file
00300         while (!File::Exists(gcnew String(m_sourcename)) || FAILED(pGraph->RenderFile(A2W(m_sourcename), NULL))) {
00301                 AfxMessageBox("Video file: \""+m_sourcename+"\" appears corrupt or absent!\n Please select another file.", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00302                 char szFilters[] = "AVI Files (*.avi)|*.avi|MPEG Files (*.mpg)|*.mpg|All Files (*.*)|*.*||";
00303                 CFileDialog fileDlg (TRUE, "avi", "*.avi", OFN_FILEMUSTEXIST | OFN_HIDEREADONLY, szFilters, NULL);
00304                 if ( fileDlg.DoModal () == IDOK )
00305                 {
00306                         m_sourcename = fileDlg.GetPathName();
00307                 }
00308                 else {
00309                         return false;
00310                 }
00311 
00312         }
00313 
00314 
00315         return true;
00316 }

00318 bool SequenceProcessor::InitThermal() {
00319         USES_CONVERSION;
00320 
00321         // Render (thermal) file for color+thermal sequences
00322 
00323         //notify VMR9 of two inputs
00324         //pConfig->SetNumberOfStreams(2);
00325 
00326         // Create ISampleGrabber to grab frames
00327         if (FAILED(CoCreateInstance(CLSID_SampleGrabber, NULL, CLSCTX_INPROC_SERVER, IID_IBaseFilter, (void**)&pGrabberFT))) {
00328                 ::MessageBox( NULL, "Failed to create SampleGrabber filter!", "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION );            
00329                 return false;
00330         }
00331         ISampleGrabber *pGrabberT;
00332         thermalGrabber = new ThermalGrabber(this);
00333         pGrabberFT->QueryInterface(IID_ISampleGrabber, (void**)&pGrabberT);
00334         ZeroMemory(&thermalGrabber->m_mediaType, sizeof(AM_MEDIA_TYPE));
00335         thermalGrabber->m_mediaType.majortype = MEDIATYPE_Video;
00336         thermalGrabber->m_mediaType.subtype = MEDIASUBTYPE_RGB24;
00337         if (FAILED(pGrabberT->SetMediaType(&thermalGrabber->m_mediaType))) {
00338                 ::MessageBox( NULL, "Media type is not True Color RGB!", "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION );         
00339                 return false;
00340         }
00341         pGrabberT->SetBufferSamples( FALSE );
00342         pGrabberT->SetOneShot( FALSE );
00343         pGrabberT->SetCallback( thermalGrabber, 0 );
00344 
00345         if (FAILED(pGraph->AddFilter(pGrabberFT, L"Sample Grabber"))) {
00346                 ::MessageBox( NULL, "Failed to add SampleGrabber filter to the graph!", "Error", MB_OK | MB_ICONINFORMATION );          
00347                 return false;
00348         }
00349 
00350         while (!File::Exists(gcnew String(m_sourcenameT)) || FAILED(pGraph->RenderFile(A2W(m_sourcenameT), NULL))) {
00351                 AfxMessageBox("Thermal video file: \""+m_sourcenameT+"\" appears corrupt or absent!\n Please select another file.", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00352                 char szFilters[] = "AVI Files (*.avi)|*.avi|MPEG Files (*.mpg)|*.mpg|All Files (*.*)|*.*||";
00353                 CFileDialog fileDlg (TRUE, "avi", "*.avi", OFN_FILEMUSTEXIST | OFN_HIDEREADONLY, szFilters, NULL);
00354                 if ( fileDlg.DoModal () == IDOK )
00355                 {
00356                         m_sourcenameT = fileDlg.GetPathName();
00357                 }
00358                 else {
00359                         return false;
00360                 }
00361 
00362         }
00363         pGrabberT->GetConnectedMediaType( &thermalGrabber->m_mediaType );
00364         VIDEOINFOHEADER *pvi = (VIDEOINFOHEADER *) thermalGrabber->m_mediaType.pbFormat;
00365         thermalGrabber->m_frameRate = UNITS/(double)pvi->AvgTimePerFrame;
00366         thermalGrabber->m_frameNumber = 0;
00367         IPin *pin1 = GetPin(pGrabberFT, PINDIR_OUTPUT, 1);
00368         pin1->QueryInterface(IID_IMediaSeeking, (void **)&pMSthermal);
00369         pMSthermal->SetTimeFormat(&TIME_FORMAT_FRAME);
00370         return true;
00371 }

00377 void SequenceProcessor::IplImage2Overlay(IplImage* ipl, HBITMAP hBmp) {
00378         //if (FAILED(::SetBitmapBits(hBmp, ipl->imageSize, ipl->imageData)) || FAILED(pMixerImage->SetAlphaBitmap(&m_bmpInfo))) {
00379         if (FAILED(::SetDIBits(m_compatibleDCvideo.m_hDC, hBmp, 0, ipl->height, ipl->imageData, bmi, DIB_RGB_COLORS)) || FAILED(pMixerImage->SetAlphaBitmap(&m_bmpInfo))) {
00380                 AfxMessageBox("Could not display overlay information", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00381                 Stop();
00382         }
00383 }
00384 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00385 void SequenceProcessor::Overlay2IplImage(HBITMAP hBmp, IplImage* ipl) {
00386         if (FAILED(::GetBitmapBits(hBmp, ipl->imageSize, ipl->imageData))) {
00387                 AfxMessageBox("Could not convert overlay to IplImage", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00388                 Stop();
00389         }
00390 }
00391 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00392 /*
00393         Sets the VMR9AplhaBitmap from HBITMAP
00394 */
00395 bool SequenceProcessor::SetBitmapImage(HBITMAP hBmp, LONG cx, LONG cy) {
00396         ZeroMemory(&m_bmpInfo, sizeof(m_bmpInfo) );    
00397         m_bmpInfo.dwFlags |= VMRBITMAP_HDC;// | VMRBITMAP_SRCRECT;
00398         m_compatibleDCfloor.SelectObject(hBmp);
00399         m_bmpInfo.hdc = m_compatibleDCfloor.m_hDC;
00400         m_bmpInfo.rSrc = CRect(0, 0, cx, cy);
00401         m_bmpInfo.rDest.left = 0; m_bmpInfo.rDest.right = 1.0;
00402         m_bmpInfo.rDest.top = 0; m_bmpInfo.rDest.bottom = 1.0;
00403     m_bmpInfo.fAlpha = 1;
00404         m_bmpInfo.dwFlags |= VMRBITMAP_SRCCOLORKEY; 
00405     m_bmpInfo.clrSrcKey = INVISIBLE_COLOR;
00406         if (FAILED(pMixerImage->SetAlphaBitmap(&m_bmpInfo))) {
00407                 AfxMessageBox("Could not display overlay information", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00408                 return false;
00409         }
00410         else
00411                 return true;
00412 }
00413 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00414 bool SequenceProcessor::DisplaySeekingCapabilities() {
00415         DWORD dwCap = 0;
00416         HRESULT hr1 = pMS->GetCapabilities(&dwCap);
00417         (AM_SEEKING_CanSeekAbsolute & dwCap) ? AfxMessageBox("Can seek absolute"):1;
00418         (AM_SEEKING_CanSeekForwards & dwCap) ? AfxMessageBox("Can seek forwards"):1;
00419         (AM_SEEKING_CanSeekBackwards & dwCap) ? AfxMessageBox("Can seek backwards"):1;
00420         if (AM_SEEKING_CanSeekAbsolute & dwCap)
00421                 return true;
00422         else 
00423                 return false;
00424 }

00426 void SequenceProcessor::SetVideoPosition(LPRECT dst, bool maintainAspectRatio) {
00427         if (FAILED(pWC->SetVideoPosition(NULL, dst)))
00428                 AfxMessageBox("SetVideoPostition Failed!");
00429         if (maintainAspectRatio)        
00430                 pWC->SetAspectRatioMode(VMR_ARMODE_LETTER_BOX);
00431         else
00432                 pWC->SetAspectRatioMode(VMR_ARMODE_NONE);
00433         
00434 }

00472 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00473 void SequenceProcessor::SetState(LONG msTimeout, OAFilterState& state) {
00474         if (state == State_Stopped)
00475         StopWhenReady();
00476     else if (state == State_Running)
00477         Run();
00478         else if (state == State_Paused)
00479                 Pause();    
00480 }

00485 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00486 void SequenceProcessor::SetPosition(REFERENCE_TIME pos) {
00487         m_isSettingPositions = 1;
00488         if (pos == -1)
00489                 pos = m_frameNumber;
00490 
00491         if (m_mode == TRGBFILE)
00492                 HRESULT hr = pMSthermal->SetPositions(&pos, AM_SEEKING_AbsolutePositioning,
00493                 NULL, AM_SEEKING_NoPositioning);
00494 
00495         HRESULT hr = pMS->SetPositions(&pos, AM_SEEKING_AbsolutePositioning,
00496                         NULL, AM_SEEKING_NoPositioning);
00497 
00498 }
00499 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00500 REFERENCE_TIME SequenceProcessor::GetCurrentPosition() {
00501         HRESULT hr;
00502         REFERENCE_TIME pNow;
00503         hr = pMS->GetCurrentPosition(&pNow);
00504     if (FAILED(hr))
00505         return -1;
00506         else 
00507                 return pNow;
00508 }
00509 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00510 bool SequenceProcessor::IsPaused() {
00511         OAFilterState state;
00512         if( pMC->GetState( DELAY, &state ) == S_OK &&  state == State_Paused )
00513                 return true;
00514         return false;
00515 }
00516 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00517 bool SequenceProcessor::IsRunning() {
00518         OAFilterState state;
00519         if( pMC->GetState( DELAY, &state) == S_OK &&  state == State_Running )
00520                 return true;
00521         return false;
00522 }
00523 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00524 bool SequenceProcessor::IsStopped() {
00525         OAFilterState state;
00526         if( pMC->GetState( DELAY, &state ) == S_OK &&  state == State_Stopped )
00527                 return true;
00528         return false;
00529 }
00530 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00531 void SequenceProcessor::Clear() {
00532         if (pGraph) {
00534                 //Pause();
00535                 //OAFilterState state;
00536                 //pMC->GetState(DELAY, &state);
00537                 //WaitForSingleObject(::Win16Mutex,INFINITE);
00538                 pMC->Stop();
00539                 //while (true) {
00540                 //      if( pMC->GetState( 500, &state ) == S_OK &&  state == State_Stopped )
00541                 //              break;
00542                 //}
00543                 removeAllFilters(pGraph);
00544         }
00545 }
00546 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00547 HRESULT SequenceProcessor::RepaintPosterFrame() {
00548         // notify the graph to repaint (this make it repaint even if it's not running)
00549         IMediaEventSink *pMediaSink;
00550         pGraph->QueryInterface(IID_IMediaEventSink, (void**)&pMediaSink);
00551         pMediaSink->Notify(EC_REPAINT, NULL, NULL);
00552         return S_OK;
00553 }
00554 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00555 HRESULT SequenceProcessor::ShowPosterFrame(HWND  hwnd, HDC  hdc) {
00556         // display poster frame
00557         //echo(String::Format("repaint in {0}", m_frameNumber));
00558         return pWC->RepaintVideo(hwnd, hdc);
00559 }
00560 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00561 void SequenceProcessor::SetTransparency(int mTransLevel) {
00562         // Set the transparency value (1.0 is opaque, 0.0 is transparent). mTransLevel is from 0 to 100
00563         m_bmpInfo.fAlpha = (float)mTransLevel/100;
00564         pMixerImage->UpdateAlphaBitmapParameters(&m_bmpInfo);
00565 }
00566 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00567 void SequenceProcessor::SetVideoWindow(HWND  hwnd) {
00568         m_screenname = hwnd;
00569         pME->SetNotifyWindow ( ( OAHWND ) m_screenname, WM_GRAPHNOTIFY, 0 ) ;
00570         // specify the container window that the video should be clipped to
00571         pWC->SetVideoClippingWindow(m_screenname);
00572         //pWC->SetVideoClippingWindow(NULL);
00573 }
